channel.title: Martha Stewart on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Martha Stewart on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: From Martha to Diddy, Trial Sketch Artist Draws History Live From the Courtroom
item.description: Elizabeth Williams has sketched some of the biggest trials of the past 30 years as the new business has shifted around her: “It’s social media. Dilution.”
